DOC.brief_summary: The primary aim study examine effect mindfulness-based stress reduction training program , deliver individual web-based session , among breast cancer patient . The objective study answer question regard effect train randomize controlled trial include follow outcome measure : physical mental health status , perceive stress , post-traumatic stress symptom , psychological well-being , sleep quality . In addition primary aim , investigator plan explore potential mechanism mindfulness train lead improvement perceive stress , well-being sleep-quality . This studied mediational analysis .
DOC.brief_title: Effects Mindfulness Meditation Stress Management After Breast Cancer
DOC.criteria: Breast cancer patient ≥ 18 year age receive cancer diagnosis ≤ 2 year previously Access regular use internet Non Swedish speak Previous sever psychiatric illness
